00209         """Transforms float coordinates into canvas coordinates."""
00210         # for now with no respect to the translation & zooming
00211         # but it can deal with polar coordinate systems
00212 
00213         if type_ == "polar": # determine the canvas local (with respect to csys_ints) coordinates in cartesian
00214             localv = reals[0]*math.cos(reals[1]/180.0*3.14159), reals[0]*math.sin(reals[1]/180.0*3.14159)
00215         else:
00216             localv = reals[0], reals[1]
00217         return [csys_ints[0]+int(localv[0]*self.scale_f2i[1]/self.scale_f2i[0]),
00218                 csys_ints[1]-int(localv[1]*self.scale_f2i[1]/self.scale_f2i[0])]
